name: 10ans
description: Wesbite made with Next js & Sanity

scripts.export:sezane:en_eu: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=sezane NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_eu next build && next export -o ./dist/sezane/en-eu
scripts.export:sezane:en_da: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=sezane NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_da next build && next export -o ./dist/sezane/en-da
scripts.export:sezane:fr_fr: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=sezane NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=fr_fr next build && next export -o ./dist/sezane/fr-fr
scripts.export:sezane:en_us: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=sezane NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_us next build && next export -o ./dist/sezane/en-us
scripts.export:sezane:en_au: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=sezane NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_au next build && next export -o ./dist/sezane/en-au
scripts.export:sezane:en_uk: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=sezane NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_uk next build && next export -o ./dist/sezane/en-uk
scripts.export:sezane: npm run export:sezane:en_eu && npm run export:sezane:fr_fr && npm run export:sezane:en_us && npm run export:sezane:en_uk && npm run export:sezane:en_au && npm run export:sezane:en_da
scripts.export:octobre:en_eu: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=octobre NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_eu next build && next export -o ./dist/octobre/en-eu
scripts.export:octobre:en_da: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=octobre NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_da next build && next export -o ./dist/octobre/en-da
scripts.export:octobre:fr_fr: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=octobre NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=fr_fr next build && next export -o ./dist/octobre/fr-fr
scripts.export:octobre:en_us: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=octobre NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_us next build && next export -o ./dist/octobre/en-us
scripts.export:octobre:en_au: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=octobre NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_au next build && next export -o ./dist/octobre/en-au
scripts.export:octobre:en_uk: NEXT_PUBLIC_BUILD=true NEXT_PUBLIC_SANITY_API_DATASET=octobre NEXT_PUBLIC_LOCALE=en_uk next build && next export -o ./dist/octobre/en-uk
scripts.export:octobre: npm run export:octobre:en_eu && npm run export:octobre:fr_fr && npm run export:octobre:en_us && npm run export:octobre:en_uk && npm run export:octobre:en_da && npm run export:octobre:en_au
scripts.export: npm run export:sezane && npm run export:octobre
